item.title: Vitalik's Vision - EthCC Paris Recap
item.description: Vitalik Buterin recently spoke at EthParis 2022, outlining his long-term and short-term goals for Ethereum. We examine the roadmap he lays out and will also break down vital technical features to play an essential role in Ethereum’s future. item.title: zkSync vs StarkWare - What's the difference between the top two ZK Rollups?

item.title: Optimism vs. Arbitrum - A Complete Comparison
item.description: Optimism and Arbitrum , two of the largest layer-two (L2) solutions that utilize Optimistic rollup technology to scale the Ethereum network. I will do a full comparison in this article. This article was first published to TokenInsight by Lawrence Lim. Original article linked here Background Optimism and Arbitrum are two of the largest layer-two (L2) solutions that utilize Optimistic rollup technology to scale the Ethereum network. Source: https://l2fees.info/ At present, Ethereum’s high transaction fees and limited throughput of ~15 transactions per second (TPS) severely limits its scalability.
